CustomSql.Name: New custom SQL
CustomSql.SqlQuery:
SELECT 
    cast(from_unixtime(time/1000) as timestamp) as Date,
    cloud.region as cloud_region,
    cloud.account_uid as account_uid,
    severity,
    severity_id,
    activity_name,
    type_name,
    cast(src_endpoint.port AS varchar) as src_endpoint_port,
    src_endpoint.ip AS src_endpoint_ip,
    src_endpoint.subnet_uid AS src_endpoint_subnet_uid,
    src_endpoint.vpc_uid as src_vpc_uid,
    cast(dst_endpoint.port AS varchar) as dst_endpoint_port,
    dst_endpoint.ip AS dst_endpoint_ip,
    dst_endpoint.subnet_uid AS dst_endpoint_subnet_uid,
    dst_endpoint.vpc_uid as dst_vpc_uid,
    connection_info.direction AS connection_info_direction,
    connection_info.boundary AS connection_info_boundary, 
    connection_info.tcp_flags as tcp_flags,
    traffic.packets AS traffic_packets,
    traffic.bytes AS traffic_bytes
FROM "amazon_security_lake_glue_db_<aws-security-lake-region>"."amazon_security_lake_table_<aws-security-lake-region>_vpc_flow_1_0"
WHERE eventDay >= cast(date_format(current_timestamp - INTERVAL '6' month, '%Y%m%d%H') as varchar)

CustomSql.Name: New custom SQL
CustomSql.SqlQuery:
SELECT 
    cast(from_unixtime(time/1000) as timestamp) as Date,
    cloud.region,
    http_request.user_agent,

    api.response.error as api_response_error,
    api.response.message as api_response_message,
    api.operation as api_operation,
    api.request.uid as api_request_uid,
    api.service.name as api_service_name,
    
    src_endpoint.uid as src_endpoint_uid,
    src_endpoint.ip as src_endpoint_ip,
    src_endpoint.domain as src_endpoint_domain,
	
    actor.user.type as identity_user_type,
    actor.user.name as identity_user_name,
    actor.user.uid as identity_user_uid,
    actor.user.uuid as identity_user_uuid,
    actor.user.credential_uid as identity_user_credential_uid,
    actor.user.account_uid,
    actor.session.created_time as identity_session_created_time,
    actor.session.mfa as identity_session_mfa,
    actor.session.issuer as identity_session_issuer,
    actor.idp.name as identity_idp,
	
	unmapped['eventCategory'] as unmapped_event_category,
    unmapped['responseElement'] as unmapped_response_element,
    unmapped['requestParameters'] as unmapped_request_parameters,
    unmapped['recipientAccountId'] as unmapped_recipient_account_id,
    unmapped['eventType'] as unmapped_event_type,
    unmapped['managementEvent'] as unmapped_management_event,
    unmapped['readOnly'] as unmapped_read_only,
    
    json_extract(unmapped['additionalEventData'], '$.SignatureVersion') as unmapped_additional_signature_version,
    json_extract(unmapped['additionalEventData'], '$.CipherSuite') as unmapped_additional_cipher_suit,
    json_extract(unmapped['additionalEventData'], '$.AuthenticationMethod') as unmapped_additional_auth_method,
    json_extract(unmapped['additionalEventData'], '$.SSEApplied') as unmapped_additional_sse_applied,
    cast(json_extract(unmapped['additionalEventData'], '$.bytesTransferredIn') as double) as unmapped_additional_bytes_tx_in,
    cast(json_extract(unmapped['additionalEventData'], '$.bytesTransferredOut') as double) as unmapped_additional_bytes_tx_out,
    json_extract(unmapped['requestParameters'], '$.bucketName') as unmapped_additional_bucket_name,
    json_extract(unmapped['requestParameters'], '$.Host') as unmapped_additional_host,
    json_extract(unmapped['requestParameters'], '$.key') as unmapped_additional_key,
    json_extract(unmapped['requestParameters'], '$.functionName') as unmapped_additional_function_name,
    json_extract(unmapped['requestParameters'], '$.invocationType') as unmapped_additional_invocation_type,
    json_extract(unmapped['requestParameters'], '$.logType') as unmapped_additional_log_type,
    json_extract(unmapped['requestParameters'], '$.roleArn') as unmapped_additional_role_arn,
    json_extract(unmapped['requestParameters'], '$.roleSessionName') as unmapped_additional_session_name,
    json_extract(unmapped['requestParameters'], '$.durationSeconds') as unmapped_additional_duration_sec,
    json_extract(unmapped['requestParameters'], '$.encryptionAlgorithm') as unmapped_additional_encryption_algorithm,
    json_extract(unmapped['requestParameters'], '$.encryptionContext.aws:lambda:FunctionArn') as unmapped_additional_encryption_context

FROM amazon_security_lake_glue_db_<aws-security-lake-region>.amazon_security_lake_table_<aws-security-lake-region>_cloud_trail_mgmt_1_0
WHERE  eventDay >= cast(date_format(current_timestamp - INTERVAL '1' month, '%Y%m%d%H') as varchar)

CustomSql.Name: New custom SQL
CustomSql.SqlQuery:
SELECT  
    cast(from_unixtime(time/1000) as timestamp) as Date,
    state,
    region,
    accountid,
    confidence,
    finding.created_time,
    finding.uid,
    finding.desc,
    finding.title,
    finding.modified_time,
    finding.last_seen_time,
    finding.related_events,
    finding.types,
    finding.remediation.kb_articles,
    finding.src_url,
    compliance.status,
    compliance.requirements,
    compliance.status_detail,
    malware,
    vulnerabilities,
    unmapped['Severity_Normalized'] as Severity_Normalized,
    unmapped['Severity_Original'] as Severity_Original,
    unmapped['CompanyName'] as CompanyName,
    unmapped['Severity'] as Severity,
    unmapped['RecordState'] as RecordState,
    unmapped['Severity_Product'] as Severity_Product
    FROM "amazon_security_lake_glue_db_<aws-security-lake-region>"."amazon_security_lake_table_<aws-security-lake-region>_sh_findings_1_0"
    WHERE eventDay >= cast(date_format(current_timestamp - INTERVAL '6' month, '%Y%m%d%H') as varchar)

CustomSql.Name: New custom SQL
CustomSql.SqlQuery:
with d as (
    select 
        uuid() as recordId,
        cast(from_unixtime(time/1000) as timestamp) as Date,
        metadata.product.name as product,
        metadata.product.feature.name as feature,
        cloud.account_uid as accountId,
        cloud.region as region,
        cloud.provider as provider,
        src_endpoint.vpc_uid as srcVpc,
        src_endpoint.ip as srcIp,
        cast(src_endpoint.port AS varchar) as src_endpoint_port,
        src_endpoint.instance_uid as srcInstance,
        dst_endpoint.instance_uid as dstInstance,
        dst_endpoint.interface_uid as dstInterface,
        connection_info.protocol_name as protocolName,
        connection_info.direction as protocolDirection,
        connection_info.direction_id as protocolDirectionId,
        class_name as className,
        category_name as categoryName,
        severity,
        activity_name as activityName,
        type_name as typeName,
        rcode as rCode, 
        query.hostname as queryHostname,
        query.type as queryType,
        query.class as queryClass,
        cardinality(answers) as answersCount,
        case when cardinality(answers) = 0 then ARRAY[null] else answers end answers
    FROM amazon_security_lake_glue_db_<aws-security-lake-region>.amazon_security_lake_table_<aws-security-lake-region>_route53_1_0 as r53
    WHERE eventDay >= cast(date_format(current_timestamp - INTERVAL '6' month, '%Y%m%d%H') as varchar)
) select
    *, 
    case when answer is null then null else answer.type end as rType, 
    case when answer is null then null else answer.class end as rClass,
    case when answer is null then null else answer.rData end as rData
from d, unnest(answers) as t(answer)

CustomSql.Name: New custom SQL
CustomSql.SqlQuery:
WITH cloud_trail as
    (select
       cast(from_unixtime(time/1000) as timestamp) as Date,
        class_name, activity_name, region, accountid
    FROM amazon_security_lake_glue_db_<aws-security-lake-region>.amazon_security_lake_table_<aws-security-lake-region>_cloud_trail_mgmt_1_0
    WHERE  eventDay >= cast(date_format(current_timestamp - INTERVAL '6' month, '%Y%m%d%H') as varchar)
    ),
route53 as
    (select
        cast(from_unixtime(time/1000) as timestamp) as Date,
        class_name, activity_name, region, accountid
    FROM amazon_security_lake_glue_db_<aws-security-lake-region>.amazon_security_lake_table_<aws-security-lake-region>_route53_1_0
    WHERE eventDay >= cast(date_format(current_timestamp - INTERVAL '6' month, '%Y%m%d%H') as varchar)
    ),
sh_findings as
    (select
        cast(from_unixtime(time/1000) as timestamp) as Date,
        class_name, activity_name, region, accountid
    FROM amazon_security_lake_glue_db_<aws-security-lake-region>.amazon_security_lake_table_<aws-security-lake-region>_sh_findings_1_0
    WHERE eventDay >= cast(date_format(current_timestamp - INTERVAL '6' month, '%Y%m%d%H') as varchar)
    ),
vpc_flow as
    (select
        cast(from_unixtime(time/1000) as timestamp) as Date,
        class_name, activity_name, region, accountid
    FROM amazon_security_lake_glue_db_<aws-security-lake-region>.amazon_security_lake_table_<aws-security-lake-region>_vpc_flow_1_0
    WHERE eventDay >= cast(date_format(current_timestamp - INTERVAL '6' month, '%Y%m%d%H') as varchar)
    )
select * from cloud_trail
union all
select * from route53
union all
select * from sh_findings
union all
select * from vpc_flow
